mapper.insert: insert into t_menu ( menu_code, menu_name, menu_url, remark, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version ) values ( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{menuRemark}, #{isDeleted}, #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select a.menu_code menuId, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_url menuPath, a.version version from t_menu a where a.is_delete = 0 order by a.create_time desc
select a.menu_code menuId, a.menu_name menuName, a.menu_url menuPath, a.version version from t_menu a where a.is_delete = 0 and a.role = #{role} order by a.create_time desc
select menu_code menuId, menu_name menuName, menu_url menuPath, remark menuRemark, version version from t_menu where menu_code = #{menuId} and is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update t_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_url = #{menuPath}, remark = #{menuRemark}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where menu_code = #{menuId} and version = #{version}
update t_menu set is_delete = 1, update_time = now(), update_user = #{Id}, version = version + 1 where menu_code = #{menuId}
